result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael R. BOSSHART II was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Submit to random urine screens and pay for same.

Defendant is to carry a picture of his son 24 hours a day, seven days a week.

No contact with any known drug dealers or users.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael R. BOSSHART II

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Notice of Case Status Change and Discharge from DOC indicating that defendant was discharged from probation effective 09-03-2016
Notice of Case Status Change and Discharge from DOC indicating that defendant was discharged from probation effective 09-03-2016
Defendant's Notice of Motion; Defendant's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.

Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 2 for further proceedings.  Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.  
ARRAIGNMENT 
Information filed.  Not guilty plea.  Jury Calendar.  Status conference set for 09-03-14 at 3:00 p.m.  in Branch 1.  State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.  
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of bail jumping.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 08-25-14 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $1,000.00 recognizance bond with the condition.  Bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.
Probable Cause Statement and Judicial Determination.
Minutes.
